import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Card from '@mui/material/Card'; import Box from '@mui/material/Box'; import CardContent from '@mui/material/CardContent'; import CardMedia from '@mui/material/CardMedia'; import Typography from '@mui/material/Typography'; import CardActionArea from '@mui/material/CardActionArea'; const Feedback = ({ langData }) => { const [rating, setRating] = useState(0); return (
{/* Page Header with Badge */}
We Value Your Input

Share Your Feedback

Help us improve KrishiSakhi for farmers like you. Your feedback helps us train our AI models better.

{/* Card 1: Star Rating */}

Rate Your Experience

{[1, 2, 3, 4, 5].map((star) => ( ))}

Tap to rate

{/* Card for feedback of previous crops */}



Farmer Feedbacks

{/* Card one */} Paddy After following the monsoon schedule and fertilizer tips on KrishiSakhi, my paddy yield increased by 25% this year. The 'My Farm' feature kept me organized throughout the season. {/* Feedback two */} wheat Wheat is a crop grown in cooler weather and needs much less water than paddy. It is mainly grown in the winter season. Seeds are directly sown in well-prepared fields. The crop grows for a few months, and when the plants turn golden and dry, wheat is harvested and used to make flour for foods like chapati and bread.

â€” Rajesh Kumar, Punjab

 {/* Feedback 3*/} wheat Wheat is a crop grown in cooler weather and needs much less water than paddy. It is mainly grown in the winter season. Seeds are directly sown in well-prepared fields. The crop grows for a few months, and when the plants turn golden and dry, wheat is harvested and used to make flour for foods like chapati and bread. {/* Card 2: Voice Feedback */}
